name: Grandma Tedesco's Mussels And Gravy
keywords: clam juice, mussels, seafood, gluten-free, nut-free, main course

recipeInstructions.text: In a large (6 quart) pot over medium-high heat, saute garlic in olive oil until garlic is browned on edges, about 2 minutes. Add basil, parsley and mussels. Stir gently for 30 seconds. Add clam juice. Cover pot, and increase heat to high. Steam until mussels open, about 5 minutes.
Remove mussels to serving plates. Whisk butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, into broth in pot. Boil until sauce is concentrated, about 2 to 3 minutes. Spoon over mussels. Serve immediately.
